features: Palm: DEERSKIN White tailed deer from North America gives a supple and isolating leather with a beautiful grain texture.
Backhand: WOOL TRICOT(36%wool, 25% cotton, 25% acrylic, 14% polyamide) Keeps your hands warm during cold, damp autumn days.
VEGETABLE TANNED GOAT LEATHER is a natural leather tanned with bark extract.
LINING: WOOL Our Italian wool linings keeps the hands warm under cold and damp autumn days and gives a good insulation down to minus five degrees celsius.
ELASTIC helps the glove to stay in place and protects against cold air.
